ygData.subject: Charisma
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy all, I m new to the list, and wanted to say hi, and ask a quick question.  Can anyone give me a quick run down on what spells cha affects for us?  I know
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy all, I'm new to the list, and wanted to say hi, and ask a quick
question. Can anyone give me a quick run down on what spells cha affects
for us? I know it seems to lower resist on charm and lull type spells, and
increases duration on charms. Anything else? I'm carrying around cha
equipment for when I wanna charm, but wondering what all it affects so I
have a better idea of how to balance it with other stats, mainly int.

Thanks,
Telonis 23rd level enchanter of E'ci
